page.title: 15Our School,Stebbing
page.content: Our school was built in 1878 and there are 132 children.We celebrated our centenary in July 1978 with a victorian school day when everyone dressed in Victorian costume.Our school bell was cast in 1889 and is 96 years old.It was repaired and rehung in January, 1981. We have 5 classes,a hall,a swimming pool,a playing field,and a playground. We have enthusiastic clubs,chess,athletics ,football,netball,nature and gymnastics.Most clubs enter comp- etitions.In 1985 we won these awards Essex Water Safety liaison committee competition,Braintree District netball and football cups,Dunmow District netball and football cups,and Saffron Walden rally football cup. The gymnastics club won the Saffron Walden competition.
